titleStmt.title: Of the horyble and woful destruccion of Ierusalem and of the sygnes and tokens that were seene before it was destroied: which distruction was after Christes assension. xlii. yeares. To the tune of the Queenes Almayne.
titleStmt.author: Barker, John, ballad writer.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreate beneath the Conduit, at the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist, by Thomas Colwell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist
